project.name: selinux
project.description: This project manages the integration of SELinux in Gentoo.
project.longdescription: This project manages SELinux support in Gentoo. This includes providing kernels with SELinux support, providing patches to userland utilities, writing stong Gentoo-specific default profiles, and deploying policies from Portage.
project.goals: The intention of the project is to make SELinux available to more users. These Policy should be available for common daemons. Currently we only work on servers, but desktops may be supported in the future.

dev.description: SELinux lead. Base policy, SELinux/x86, SELinux/PPC

project.resource: SELinux QuickStart Guide for converting preexisting Gentoo installations
